1 #permalink Tools

Code used by the other components and helper classes.

1.1 #permalink Animations

  • %scaleUp
    Scale up
  • %slideFromLeft
    Slide from left
  • %slideFromRight
    Slide from right
  • %rotate
    Rotate
  • %shake
    Shake

Animation classes for keyframe animations. Use @extend %class

1.2 #permalink Functions

Handy functions.

1.2.1 #permalink rem-calc($size)

  • $size
    The px size

Convert px to rem.

1.2.2 #permalink colorVariation($color, $variation, $step)

  • $color
    The color variable from variables.scss
  • $variation
    'lighten' or 'darken'
  • $step
    'numeric' The interval of the variation set in from variables.scss

Color function.

1.2.2 #permalink color($color)

  • $color
    The color variable from variables.scss

Color function.

1.2.3 #permalink spacing($spacing)

  • $spacing
    The spacing variable from variables.scss

Spacing.

1.2.4 #permalink font($font, $family)

  • $front
    The font variable from variables.scss
  • $family
    The font family variable from variables.scss (optional)

To get a font stack from variables.scss.

1.3 #permalink Helpers

  • %verticalAlign
    Vertical alignment
  • %horizontalAlign
    Horizontal alignment
  • %centerAlign
    Center alignment
  • %clearfix
    To clearfix a float element

Helper classes. Use @extend %class
